abstracts.cdata!:
The Credit would assist in financing:
            (i) LNDC's foreign exchange requirements for its
            development finance operations through mid-1979; and (ii)
            BEDCO's foreign exchange requirements for making
            small-scale enterprises loans through mid-1979.
